name: charbroil
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cook food over a direct heat, especially hot charcoal (= a hard, black fuel): Charbroil the chicken and zucchini, basting with the olive oil and herb mixture until the chicken is completely cooked. Marinated jumbo shrimps are charbroiled and served with grilled vegetables. My partner loved the blackened catfish and charbroiled oysters. Synonym
chargrill
More examplesFewer examplesTry the slow-cooked prime rib or the charbroiled salmon.This specialty of northern Mexico consists of soft tacos filled with charbroiled meats.
